techmeme.title: Zero-knowledge cryptography firm Nexus Labs raised a $25M Series A co-led by Lightspeed Venture Partners and Pantera Capital (Timmy Shen/The Block)
Atos chose a group led by Onepoint, its top shareholder, to take over the IT company; the group will invest €250M and convert €2.9B of Atos' debt into shares (Benoit Berthelot/Bloomberg)
A CA administrative judge rejects Tesla's appeal to dismiss claims by California's DMV alleging the company overstated its vehicles' self-driving capabilities (Rachel Graf/Bloomberg)
As US federal lawmakers drag out AI regulation, states make a push with a flurry of bills; TechNet: state lawmakers have proposed ~400 AI laws in recent months (Cecilia Kang/New York Times)
Google lets advertisers serve targeted ads across Google TV's 125+ free channels, and reports 20M+ US monthly active Google TV and Android TV OS devices in 2023 (Umar Shakir/The Verge)
